Class CustomGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractLayer
      • com.atakmap.android.imagecapture.CustomGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Capturable

    public class CustomGrid
extends AbstractLayer
implements Capturable
    A customizable MGRS-aligned grid

      • isDrawingLabels

        public boolean isDrawingLabels(double lat,
                               double mapRes)
        Test whether this grid is drawing it's labels This is different than showLabels since it also depends on the map zoom level
        Parameters:
        lat - Draw latitude
        mapRes - Map resolution
        Returns:
        True if drawing labels

      • getLabelPrecision

        public int getLabelPrecision()
        Get the appropriate label value precision based on spacing
        Returns:
        Value precision (i.e. 100m spacing = first 3 digits)

      • setLabelPrecision

        public void setLabelPrecision(int precision)
        Set the label precision manually
        Parameters:
        precision - Precision from 0 to 5 (0 means use automatic)

      • getLabels

        public java.lang.String[] getLabels(boolean trunc)
        Get the list of grid labels (horizontal first then vertical)
        Parameters:
        trunc - Truncate according to the default precision
        Returns:
        List of labels
